website_summaries.verdict: An affordable medicine cabinet that will work well for bathrooms that already have a mirror.
cons: Quality is not as high as some of the other products listed here

customer_reviews.title: Elegant, Practical, and Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I installed mine over my make up vanity. It pretty sturdy... it holds my lotions and creams and much more. It's also pretty roomy considering its size.
customer_reviews.author: Marah

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for our tiny powder room on the main level of our town home to get all the medicines and vitamins out of my kitchen cabinets. I am AMAZED by how much this really holds and how beautiful it is! I don't know how much I like the see-through part, I may put some black poster board over it, but undecided. If you need a cabinet this is the one to get! It was half the price as others and was very easy to assemble and everything lines up perfectly. The manufacturer even added extra parts just in case, which was great!
customer_reviews.author: HK

customer_reviews.title: A bit flimsy but overall a nice cabinet for a small space
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing quality but guess that goes with the saying of, "You get what you pay for." My bathroom is tiny so finding something the right size that doesn't require in-wall mounting was my challenge. Aesthetically, it's nice. But, the interior shelf was knicked. The hardware was cheap and literally broke in half!! The routed holes weren't properly drilled. My boyfriend is a handy guy so was able to creatively cover the finish that had spiderweb cracked as a result of the assembly efforts. He was ready to return it but we decided it wasn't worth the nuisance. Overall, it helps with our storage needs and the flaws are virtually undetected.
customer_reviews.author: Stephani

customer_reviews.title: Not tempered glass!
customer_reviews.text: The unit itself is fine but beware that the glass is NOT TEMPERED. It's inexpensive for a reason; cutting corners for cost resulted in cutting my fingers. The unit arrived with broken glass, but there was no way to know this initially since everything was so tightly packed. Grabbing the first piece of packing Styrofoam resulted in numerous tiny glass splinters in my hand. OUCH! Be careful when opening the box.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: I'd recommend this unit to anyone!
customer_reviews.text: As easy to assemble as tying your shoes, this unit was fun to put together! All holes are drilled the correct size, and in the right place. All hardware was labeled impeccably well. All parts were protected well in packaging. I'd like to see this unit in simulated white oak, or even real white oak...I'd pay! I woould hope to see more than three positions for the shelf, as well as a second shelf, rather than just one. Nonetheless, I'd recommend this unit to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Benoit

customer_reviews.title: Small bath medicine cabinet that works for our needs.
customer_reviews.text: Needed a small cabinet to replace the oversized behemoth that was in our main bath. Just the essentials need to fit. This worked out perfectly. I wish they made it to open in either direction. Since the cabinet is VERY similar top and bottom, it doesn't seem like it should be a huge manufacturing adjustment. With a bit of creativity, I got the door to open to the left. It holds everything we want it to, fits our space and is nice in appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Millersdad

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking, but...
customer_reviews.text: Overall it is a nice cabinet, however I gave it only 3 stars because when you turn the cam shaft to lock it, it will crack the side wall a bit. We have 2 of these and it did it on both of them. I think they need to improve that part of it, also a 2nd shelf would nice.
customer_reviews.author: Christian48

customer_reviews.title: easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Fits our needs perfectly! We bought two of them, easy to assemble, easy to install. We have a log home, and this fits in perfectly, a nice accent to all the wood. The glass front is really nice, you can see what is in there without seeing what is in there, if you know what I mean!!! ;-) It is surprising how much these little cabinets hold. I put little clear acrylic cutlery trays in that hold little bottles in place so they don't fall out, and also protects the bottom of the black shelf. Nice quality too for the price, very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Norsky

customer_reviews.title: Quick assembly and Mounting
customer_reviews.text: Better assembly instructions than I have seen in other products. Just make sure when attaching the back panel, the mounting holes are at at the top (like I didn't). I also pre drilled 2 additional mounting holes towards the bottom and attached with flat head dry wall screws and washers for extra support. The unit pulled away from the wall slightly when opening the door due to the magnet tension. Looks great! An extra shelf (option) at checkout would have bumped to 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice cabinet
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small medicine cabinet that would fit into my bathroom. This went together reasonably quickly and easily. It looks very nice and has been up for a few months with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: V. Harrison

customer_reviews.title: looks great
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this to hold some of my massage supplies. All my lotions and bottles fit perfectly and it looks fantastic. It was very easy to put together and so far it's sturdy. The color is more of a warm black rather than dark brown, kind of in between. Looks great with my black cabinet I put it over.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great Classy Wall Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful, very attractive cabinet. I have it hanging on my bathroom wall. I use it exclusively for storing my essential oils. My only complaint, which is just a matter of need, is that I really wish it came with two more shelves to install as I could really use them for my chosen purpose. My husband is going to try to make me at least one more shelf....otherwise it is great and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: DocNunn

customer_reviews.title: I really really want to like this more but it is very very very difficult ...
customer_reviews.text: I really really want to like this more but it is very very very difficult to make the door stay shut. I've tried all I can think of but unless you sit there and keep closing it over and over until it decides to stay then the whole thing hangs wide open. I would have returned it except that this problem does not appear until after it's put together and on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet is great! The perfect size! Not too big and not small either! The shelf inside is adjustable to three levels! I gave 4 stars for assembly because part of it includes glue and it was weird.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Duffy

customer_reviews.title: Improperly manufactured.
customer_reviews.text: You must assemble this. Which is okay except for the fact that they maker did NOT drill ALL of the holes needed. Now I must take it all apart and TRY to get it back into the box so that I can send it back. Waste of time. Big disappointment. I wish I had never bought it. If not mounted to the wall, when you open the door, the cabinet falls over. The door is too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous2018

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and looks great
customer_reviews.text: I love this medicine cabinet! My new apartment doesn't have one so I improvised and bought this one. It was easy to put together and install. Looks great and functions well!
customer_reviews.author: H. HAGOOD

customer_reviews.title: I like it and it serves its purpose.
customer_reviews.text: The quality is not going to blow your mind, but it's pretty darn good for the price. I had to flip the door and hardware, but I like that the door is actually privacy glass. The stain is almost opaque and this is a modern stain and "wood". It looks to be a particle type board, but it's so lathered with stain, it's hard to tell. We're happy and it's good for two people!
customer_reviews.author: Melly Lou C.

customer_reviews.title: perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love this medicine cabinet! Perfect size and color. It is exactly what it says it is. We had to tweak it a bit so the door opened up towards us but it was super easy to do. Assembly and mounting was super easy as well and it looks perfect. Also love how much height there is between the shelf's.
customer_reviews.author: Mk20

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: Bought this small cabinet for a bathroom in a rental. For the price, it serves its purpose, however, the paint was chipped off of the edge of both the top and the bottom. Otherwise, great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie S Miller

customer_reviews.title: No hardware pack!
customer_reviews.text: I will update if seller provides.... But, I received no screws, dowels, or the knob. I really wanted this up today.... I’m making a “chemo” drug Space, because I’m sick of looking at all the meds.
customer_reviews.author: SassyPie

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Great product for $30
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Great product for $30. My boyfriend and I don't have any built in medicine cabinets in our house so we were in dier need of one. This does the job. Perfect size and color. Only downside is that the door can only be put easily on one way.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Gluck

customer_reviews.title: Matches my vanity perfectly- a good fit!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to assemble but the glue was not that reliable. When we attached to the wall, it did not hold that well, even though I let it dry for two days. Buy your own glue!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Dougherty

customer_reviews.title: Be Careful on Installation!
customer_reviews.text: There are a few tiny complaints about these, but nothing to make me change my mind about wanting them! We originally bought one for our guest bathroom. My husband had some trouble putting it up on the wall [he's quite the handyman lately, too!] and ended up putting DEEP scratches in the wall. Thinking he could do the second one better, since we liked how well it looked in general after installation, we ordered a second one! The same thing happened, DEEP scratches in the wall in our own bathroom! Aside from the scratches, the cabinet itself is a little shallow, but otherwise it's perfect! It looks gorgeous, too!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Renae

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be more pleased
customer_reviews.text: My husband put this cabinet together and he said it was easy. It looks great in our master bathroom. It is sturdy, better quality than expected - it's great, and looks very contemporary yet with a classic elegance. I'm going to purchase another for our guest bathroom. The dark espresso color is exactly what we were hoping for, couldn't be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer G.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little cabinet!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! I needed a quick fix for the apartment and this was the right size and easiest on my wallet. I figured for the price, I would get what I paid for. This little cabinet is fantastic! It’s small but, I needed something smaller for the space available. It was easy to assemble and easy to install on the wall. I can’t believe how little I paid for something so solid and useful. I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: J. Ruffier

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for a good price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to go with the freestanding cabinet. Quality for the price and arrived in good shape. Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tflynn

customer_reviews.title: Cheap paint chipping from it already only after having it a month or so, not real wood, a pain to assemble, most be better
customer_reviews.text: This is not real wood and only shortly after buying it and using it, I noticed the paint chipping off it, seems very cheap and you have to assemble too, which was a chore. Overall, looks OK, but cheap and nothing great. Question the quality of this product, paint chips easily.
customer_reviews.author: JMF51

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, but is a project to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: This item comes completely disassembled so be ready for a project. If you are a little bit handy and can read instructions it goes together easily. The quality is OK and probably good for the price. It came with scratches and scuffs but mostly in hidden places so no one can see. The drill guide for placing holes to hang it was very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyne O. Mobbs

customer_reviews.title: Love this collection
customer_reviews.text: Love this collection. The prices really make the bathroom look updated and modern. I don't have studs close enough together to hang it, unfortunately, so it just sits on top of another cabinet for now.
customer_reviews.author: NolaGirl

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Medicine Cabinet.
customer_reviews.text: It fits perfectly in our little bathroom and easy to install. Decent product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Thy Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Needed a new medicine cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Needed a new medicine cabinet, didn't want it to be too big & no mirror. Love the glass the only thing I changed was the knob to a brushed nickel to go with the faucet.
customer_reviews.author: MOMof3

customer_reviews.title: It looks really good. I put something slightly damp on top of ...
customer_reviews.text: It looks really good. I put something slightly damp on top of it and the surface layer chipped off along the top edge, revealing a cheap MDF-type wood under a thin veneer. But it's exactly what I needed for my space and was dirt cheap, so I'm not complaining.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Binford

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: easy to put together, if you've ever put together ikea you can figure this out. took maybe less than 30 minutes to put it together and hang it. Surprisingly high quality for the price, really like the "frosted" glass front.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Yeah great deal set up easy nothing damaged very nice would buy it again if I get another house.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Caruso

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful small cabinet!
customer_reviews.text: This is nicer than I thought. It is exactly as pictured, it was not difficult to put together, although I had someone do it for me who is far more talented at this than I am. Lovely, perfect for that small guest room bathroom, and very well made. The door opens and closes with no problem, arrivedin fine condition, no issues at all. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: readingisfun

customer_reviews.title: Few changes would make it better
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars because half the cams wouldn't lock down. Ended up gluing and screwing a 1x4 to hold it together. Company should add cross section, dowels, drill holes and charge a few $s more so you can hang either way without adding your own support.
customer_reviews.author: pink flamingo

customer_reviews.title: I think this piece is quite nice from the photo and reviews
customer_reviews.text: Actually, I think this piece is quite nice from the photo and reviews, but I ordered it twice and both times it came with the glass broken so I'm returning. I don't think I'll try for a 3rd time.
customer_reviews.author: E. Frost

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Great Quality at such an affordable price, easy to assemble, directions are professional.
customer_reviews.author: Charles E Schumann

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: I chose this cabinet for the size (the shelf is adjustable to fit larger bottles such as rubbing alcohol, hydrogen peroxide, etc.) and the darker color. The cabinet arrived packed very well - No broken pieces and all of the hardware was included. I do recommend purchasing more heavy duty wall anchors since the cabinet is heavy. We are looking forward to purchasing a companion piece from this collection for another bathroom since we were so impressed with the quality. For the price you will not find a better medicine cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Ann C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: it's what it says it is
customer_reviews.text: everything is as pictured. came with all the parts. easy to assemble. it really is espresso - it won't pass for black matte. i wish there was a way to attach the door to open the other direction. i mean, if it was made of something sturdier than particle board you could, but trying would destroy it. it would be nice to have 2 shelves.
customer_reviews.author: lll

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Love these cabinets. I used them on top of my end tables to hide all of my husband medication. They not only look great in our room but now its all clean and I don't have to see a mess. 😂. Be prepared to secure them to the wall for stability but,it was easy to put the cabinet together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get this one!
customer_reviews.text: Follow the instructions and you'll be fine. It is perfect, goes together easily, and was up within 15 minutes of starting the project. I don't understand the complaints posted on it being difficult. Instructions were clear, the wall template worked peachy. Piece of cake and excellent quality. I use it daily.
customer_reviews.author: jmb San Diego

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: great quality and looks very elegant. Very happy with my purchases...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the look in the construction of this piece
customer_reviews.text: Arrived today and assembled it myself. I like the look in the construction of this piece. Was easily modified to drill holes for on stud mounting at 16in on Center. Internal width of cabinet is 16.25", which accommodated both holes and screw heads. They shipped enough glue to go into the dowel holes and along each upright base for added support. Just clean it up afterwards. Great job manufacturer! I hung it myself, but would have been easier as a two-man job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Medicine Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: This is a very handsome and sturdy medicine cabinet. The waffle glass really makes it. The only thing I felt it needed were 4-pre-drilled holes on back panel to mount/secure to the wall. Definite 5-star.
customer_reviews.author: cyberianmanx

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS! I bought if for my husbands bathroom
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS! I bought if for my husbands bathroom. He is very particular. He didn't think for such a good price that it would be nice. But we were surprised. It is a gorgeous cabinet and very well made. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: DSMimi

customer_reviews.title: This was so easy to put together and they also send you a ...
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to put together and they also send you a template so that you can hang it perfectly wherever you want it. Very impressed at the price of this and I will definitely buy another one
customer_reviews.author: Amy W

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful surface mount medicine cabinets.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these when we renovated our bathroom, they look great, the glass is beautiful. They were easy to put together. We put them in tandem above the toilet separated by 6", wow, what a look. I would definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Edward K. Molen

customer_reviews.title: Nice small cabinet to offer extra storage in bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Nice small cabinet to offer extra storage in bathroom. Really like glass insert in door. Much better for my use than mirrored medicine cabinet. At first worried about color, but once assembled and installed, I am very pleased. Planning to get larger version as well.
customer_reviews.author: ThriftyMom

customer_reviews.title: I would like it better if it were just a little more ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband's bathroom. I would like it better if it were just a little more opaque. You can see everything inside. Other than that, it's a nice cabinet and looks great on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Zolu

customer_reviews.title: None
customer_reviews.text: Used for my rv, looks great, tricky to mount on wall
customer_reviews.author: steve finley

customer_reviews.title: looks excactly the way it is on the picture
customer_reviews.text: looks nice,but if you have a lot of bulky medication than it might not be for you.
customer_reviews.author: Silvia

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice cabinet however I wish the glass was frosted on the inside. Anything within the cabinet can be seen.
customer_reviews.author: Dusk Maiden

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: Great sturdy product, easy to assemble and a great price. Look nice and adjustable shelves make this cabinet just what I was looking for. When I ordered two of these and one came broken, I received a replacement super quick with no hassles. Great Product.
customer_reviews.author: E. Ray

customer_reviews.title: Does this product come in a lighter brown color?
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for the price. However the expresso finish does not match with my brown décor. Does this item also come in a lighter brown color?
customer_reviews.author: maria rollock

customer_reviews.title: classic medicine cabinet!
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely the best for your medicine cabinet or any cabinet you need. really sleek, sturdy and classy. don't buy other stuff. they don't look as amazing as these.
customer_reviews.author: Youngster

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and easy to put together. Looks great on the wall and the color is nice. Too bad my wife ripped it off the wall when we were moving instead of letting me do it, now I no longer have a medicine cabinet. Would buy again if I had a place for it in the new house.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: This item is simply adorable. Its just the right size and was easily ...
customer_reviews.text: This item is simply adorable. Its just the right size and was easily installed. I only have 1 gripe and its with the color. I thought it would be a dark almost black but yet its a milky chocolate color. It doesn't go well with my other espresso items, but I am making it work.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Carole

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, easy to assemble, good price, good quality. The mounting template that came inside the package made installation easy. It took a small amount of "outside the box" thought to reverse the door.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M.

customer_reviews.title: Works great! You can still see the spices through the ...
customer_reviews.text: I actually hung this cabinet on the kitchen wall and am using it as a spice rack. Works great! You can still see the spices through the waffle glass but at least they aren't out in the open like other spice racks that hang on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Osborn

customer_reviews.title: Great little cabinet
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleasantly surprised by the quality of this product for the price. Also FYI you CAN reverse the door so that the hinge was on the left simply by flipping it.
customer_reviews.author: biz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful medicine cabinet!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this medicine cabinet. Easy to put together and hung wirh the help of my husband. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: RWM

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but smaller than the 2 door
customer_reviews.text: We bought the set of these and even though it's listed as the same dimensions as the 2 door it is significantly smaller. It looks really nice. Almost black which is what we wanted and is very sturdy. It was easy to put together but I do know my husband used some different brackets for the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Great buy but scratches on the inside shelf :/
customer_reviews.text: All and all a very nice product. Everything came in nicely packaged. Only thing the shelf was scratched on one of the sides. Ill be on the inside so probably nobody will notice. Seems sturdy just have to hang it now.
customer_reviews.author: DjProfessorOak

customer_reviews.title: We especially like the textured glass
customer_reviews.text: We added a second cabinet to our master bathroom and this just did the trick. We especially like the textured glass. The size was just right to store our taller shampoo bottles and provide extra storage as well as a bit of flair.
customer_reviews.author: living the dream.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this furniture. It's very nice. The color is beautiful. I like the style.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: After alot of looking, I decided to go with this cabinet for my bathroom. it is the perfect size for what I needed. You can assmble so that the door opens on whichever side you prefer. Assembly was fairly easy. Took about 20 minutes. The only issue I had was that first cabinet that arrived to me, the glass was shattered so I had to return it and get another one. Return was very simple and hassle free.
customer_reviews.author: kconrad11

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this. Easy to put together and hang on wall. Looks very nice on wall. Strong and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for over the toilet, especially in a small half bath.
customer_reviews.author: Toni C.

customer_reviews.title: Great but more of ebony than espresso
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little cabinet, sturdier than I thought it would be and really nice looking. The color of the one we received is MUCH different than the online photos. It's listed as "espresso", which can mean different colors to different companies. In this case "espresso" is nearly black, not the cherry-like color in the photos. We're using this cabinet as a spice cabinet in our kitchen, and it works for us since we have ebony-type accents. It's a really nice piece; it just doesn't look like the photo.
customer_reviews.author: PB

customer_reviews.title: It came scratched in many places and just is the usual crap that comes from a sweat shop in China
customer_reviews.text: After the hell of assembling this, It actually looks ok. It came scratched in many places and just is the usual crap that comes from a sweat shop in China. If you can fight your way through the assembly without a domestic violence offence, it does look quite nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than Expected
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical to purchase this item because the price was so good, I thought it would look cheap. I was so surprised when it arrived. In a small bathroom the size is perfect. The color is rich and dark (almost black), exactly what I wanted. It was very well packaged and had to be assembled but my husband said it was not a problem. Has two shelves and they can adjust to any height so you can store whatever size item you have. The glass is frosted to disguise your stuff but you can see through it a bit. If the size is right for you, I say buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Mar

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $
customer_reviews.text: Perfect medicine cabinet for my rental since it wasn't expensive! Looks nice, not like some stupid regular s***ty medicine cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren R.

customer_reviews.title: very nice cabinet
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet was a bit larger than I expected, but it looks great in my tiny bathroom. I needed the door to open from the right, so I had to hang the cabinet upside-down (putting the magnet latch on the bottom-right) but that's okay. This cabinet was half the price of other, similar pieces, so I am quite pleased.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, easy to build, pretty cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Love this cabinet, it is aesthetically pleasing, easy to build, and it fits in really good well as additional storage
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly, great looks and value
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly, great looks and value. I have this free standing on my toilet tank lid. Though the door would make it likely to tip over when it's empty that isn't an issue if you have it full.
customer_reviews.author: W. Burkholder

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: With this being less expensive than some cabinets, I was a bit hesitant to buy. But I got it put together and it looks great and feels rather sturdy! I would buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Mon Ket

customer_reviews.title: Great cabinet for the price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together kit, all the pieces fit well, and it makes a very attractive shelving unit with convenient, adjustable shelf. Can't beat it for the price after doing a lot of comparison shopping. The textured glass on the front adds extra touch of class.
customer_reviews.author: Mariela

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Cabinet!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price. I was pleasantly surprised. Very easy to put together and install.
customer_reviews.author: Graham

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pre-fab cabinet
customer_reviews.text: No odor detected on mine. Perfect pre-fab cabinet, assembly required 20 minutes. Color is almost black, a very dark brown. Hint: put the door on after mounting to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: 6wheels

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: Product looks good and assemble easily, however quality of door hinges are not able to handle the weight of door frame with glass, I bought 2 of this and one still in the box not used after I installed first one...
customer_reviews.author: Tim Tou

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect fit for my bathroom and matched an existing floor cabinet that I have. Color was as described. Not hard to assemble, but a little bit of a pain. Instructions were not clear at one point, leaving me to undo and re attach. Looks great and mounted securely.
customer_reviews.author: Loriski

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cabinet for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It is a pretty little cabinet for our spare bathroom . It was easy to put it together. Needed the door to open on the other side so turned the cabinet upside down and put the door on the other side. Which worked rather well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product once you work for an hour to put it together!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Super!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fit just right, great quality, easy to install, and love the glass because you can see thru but you can not make out the products or items ! Love the piece, would recommend this for everyone that need a small medicine cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Shaip

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its all scretched out altho it was packed nicely..oh well.you get what you pay for :)
customer_reviews.author: Dzikoski Slobodan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great gift for my dad who insists on a medicine cabinet!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Card

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality! Exactly what I needed for an amazing price!
customer_reviews.author: shoppinglady

customer_reviews.title: Great Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 for my husband's bathroom. They are made well, the glass in the door is real glass, and they look great on the wall. My husband is very pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Sims

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: This a beautiful cabinet. It's sturdy and was easy to assemble. The directions were easy to follow. It gives my discreet bathroom items a stylish way to be stored.
customer_reviews.author: anastasia40

customer_reviews.title: No cabinets in the house
customer_reviews.text: We just bought a new house and there were no cabinets in the bathroom. This was a perfect solution and was easy to put together. Mounting it on wall was easy and no help was needed.
customer_reviews.author: John Doe

customer_reviews.title: Great Bathroom Cabinet (looks great).  Reasonable install time.  Great price/seller.  Shipped fast
customer_reviews.text: Great Bathroom Cabinet (looks great). Installation wasn't too bad (maybe 30 mins). Great price/seller. Shipped fast!!!! Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Justin C.

customer_reviews.title: The glass door is quite heavy and causes the cabinet ...
customer_reviews.text: The glass door is quite heavy and causes the cabinet to tip if it is not weighted equally on the other side or bolted to a wall.
customer_reviews.author: J. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Nice little medicine cabnet
customer_reviews.text: Very cute for the price. Took awhile to put together but not too difficult. Only complaint is that you can not switch which way the door opens. Awkward for where we needed to install it.
customer_reviews.author: J Burnett

customer_reviews.title: The twins love it too
customer_reviews.text: This is the second cabinet I've bought. I added a shelf and made a spice cabinet out of it. My lady loves it on the kitchen counter. Sadly though the glass on the second was broken when I opened the box to assemble for a Christmas present. Too late to return, so I've got to order a glass for it. The twins love it too, just the right size for their counter..
customer_reviews.author: Donald E. Roach

customer_reviews.title: Color Blind!
customer_reviews.text: This item is not the color depecited. It is nearly black! I have noticed several items offered by this company are described as "Espresso" color. They are clearly different one a shade of brown the other black? Please update your pictures !
customer_reviews.author: sxysenior

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Can't do anything with it as the glass is shattered!
customer_reviews.author: Miki

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hang. DO NOT put door on till you hang cabinet. So much easier!!!
customer_reviews.author: evright

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, small medicine cabinent
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic, inexpensive, and great looking medicine cabinet. It was easy to assemble, sturdy, and looks great in the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: MarLo

customer_reviews.title: Crooked door
customer_reviews.text: Looks great but the door hangs crooked and can't be adjusted since it has pre set holes for the door to be screwed into.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

product_meta.title: Elegant Home Fashions Chesterfield Bathroom Cabinet, One Size, Espresso
product_meta.description: The Chesterfield Medicine Cabinet features a waffle textured glass panel door in an espresso finish. The cabinet classic design offers ample storage. The cabinet features one fixed inner shelf that is ideal for storing items. The double plated door knobs add a charming touch. This cabinet comes with assembly hardware.
feature_bullets: Windowed medicine cabinet provides enclosed shelving
Strudy engineered-wood construction: warm espresso finish
Waffle-pattern glass door pulls with double-plated knob
Angular top molding and modern lines; minimal assembly required
One fixed inners shelf behind the glass door
Shelf Dimensions: Interior: 17”W x 3. 875”D x 17”H. (shelf) about 8. 25”H.
Door magnet and hinges are pre-hung
Care: Wipe clean using soft cloth with warm water

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars280 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
